page.description: Attempt to set or create a calculated field - returns error text if any error occured.

argument.name: variables
argument.description: A pointer to the variable scope. See Variable Data Types and Scope

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the calculated field. Character

argument.name: expression
argument.description: The definition of what the calculated field should do. Character

page.discussion: The CALCULATED_FIELD_SET() function creates a calculated variable. Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim pp as P pp = local_variables() calculated_field_set(pp, "New", "mts+dts")
